Topic.Title: How to set a player name in Gamebook?

Posts.EditableText:
So, I've read the tutorial and the problem I have is this: "result" is not an option.  I can set up everything else by hand to match the tutorial but there's no "result" option in the dropdown, and typing it in by hand does nothing.  How can I make Gamebook set a variable to match player input?

Thank you!

Edit: Never mind, figured it out myself a few seconds after posting this.  I was outputting a message, not an expression.  Derp.  Sorry!
Posts.HTML:
So, I've read the tutorial and the problem I have is this: "result" is not an option. I can set up everything else by hand to match the tutorial but there's no "result" option in the dropdown, and typing it in by hand does nothing. How can I make Gamebook set a variable to match player input?

Thank you!

Edit: Never mind, figured it out myself a few seconds after posting this. I was outputting a message, not an expression. Derp. Sorry!
